## Example Usage

{{< chooser language "typescript,python,go,csharp" / >}}

{{% example csharp %}}
```csharp
using Pulumi;
using Okta = Pulumi.Okta;

class MyStack : Stack
{
    public MyStack()
    {
        var example = Output.Create(Okta.Group.GetGroup.InvokeAsync(new Okta.Group.GetGroupArgs
        {
            Name = "Example App",
        }));
    }

}
```

{{% /example %}}

{{% example go %}}
```go
package main

import (
	"github.com/pulumi/pulumi-okta/sdk/v2/go/okta/group"
	"github.com/pulumi/pulumi/sdk/v2/go/pulumi"
)

func main() {
	pulumi.Run(func(ctx *pulumi.Context) error {
		_, err := group.LookupGroup(ctx, &group.LookupGroupArgs{
			Name: "Example App",
		}, nil)
		if err != nil {
			return err
		}
		return nil
	})
}
```

{{% /example %}}

{{% example python %}}
```python
import pulumi
import pulumi_okta as okta

example = okta.group.get_group(name="Example App")
```

{{% /example %}}

{{% example typescript %}}

```typescript
import * as pulumi from "@pulumi/pulumi";
import * as okta from "@pulumi/okta";

const example = pulumi.output(okta.group.getGroup({
    name: "Example App",
}, { async: true }));
```
